CustomField.formula: CASE( X3rd_Party_Partner__c, "Ion Solar", 1340* System_Size_Calculated_kW__c + ( Roof_Type_Adder_Contracted_Sales__c + Roof_Pitch_Adder_Contracted_Sales__c + High_Roof_Adder_Contracted_Sales__c + Trenching_Distance_Adder_Contracted__c ), 0)
CustomField.label: Ion Invoice Amount
